summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Windows Active Directory integration feature. All AD configuration endpoints working correctly. Local authentication and core loan management functionality verified.
passed_tests: AD Config GET endpoint - returns default values with ldap_available flag
AD Config PUT endpoint - saves configuration successfully
AD Test Connection - validates required fields (server_url, domain)
AD Test Connection - returns proper error for unreachable server
AD Config requires admin role authentication
Local login still works with admin/admin123
Loans list shows all loans with proper data
Admin Panel AD tab loads with all 9 UI elements
LDAP Library Available indicator shows correctly
Test Connection button shows 'Connection failed' for invalid server
Save Configuration button shows success toast
critical_code_review_comments: AD integration is well-implemented with proper error handling
LDAP library availability check is correctly implemented
Local authentication fallback works correctly when AD is disabled

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all AD tab elements and interactions working)

seed_data_creation: Created TEST_AD_Customer with loan for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: AD configuration feature fully tested. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_ad_config.py cover all AD endpoints. Frontend AD tab in Admin Panel has all required elements with data-testid attributes. LDAP library (ldap3) is installed and available. Test connection correctly fails for non-existent servers.
